meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4025.

td.p: Seth Disner, a senior from Los Angeles, California (subtotal of $27,300)
Bernard Holloway, a junior from Mitchellville, Maryland (subtotal of $22,000)
George Nelson, a senior from Montgomery, Alabama (subtotal of $20,000)

tr.td: THIS LAND IS THEIR LAND
(Alex: Watch out for this one...)
TRICKY QUESTIONS
HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES
ANIMATED CHARACTERS
(Alex: Like me.)
KNOW YOUR BIBLE
"I" AYE
